name: node-rrpc
description: Fast, and simple JavaScript RPC library built with Redis PUB/SUB.
author: Hackermon <therealhackermon@gmail.com>

scripts.preversion: yarn lint && yarn clean && yarn build
scripts.postversion: echo "committing" && git add . && git commit -m v$npm_package_version && echo "setting tag" && git tag v$npm_package_version && echo "pushing branch and tag" && git push origin HEAD --tags && echo "publishing" && yarn publish --new-version $npm_package_version && echo "Successfully released version v$npm_package_version!"
